memo_text:
* Bidder 1, starting with $20000, has won 2 items in this auction, with a total profit of $7800.:
  * Won Utensil N at $4200 over $4000, with a true value of $8000.
  * Won Unit Q at $6000 over $5000, with a true value of $10000.

* Bidder 2, starting with $20000, has won 2 items in this auction, with a total profit of $7000.:
  * Won Element R at $6000 over $5000, with a true value of $10000.
  * Won Machine P at $7000 over $5000, with a true value of $10000.

* Bidder 3, starting with $20000, has won 2 items in this auction, with a total profit of $5000.:
  * Won Gizmo F at $2500 over $2000, with a true value of $4000.
  * Won Appliance O at $4500 over $4000, with a true value of $8000.

* Bidder 4, starting with $20000, has won 7 items in this auction, with a total profit of $12400.:
  * Won Mechanism J at $4600 over $4000, with a true value of $8000.
  * Won Gadget B at $1300 over $1000, with a true value of $2000.
  * Won Doodad D at $2400 over $2000, with a true value of $4000.
  * Won Implement G at $3800 over $3000, with a true value of $6000.
  * Won Contraption I at $3500 over $3000, with a true value of $6000.
  * Won Widget A at $1300 over $1000, with a true value of $2000.
  * Won Equipment E at $2700 over $2000, with a true value of $4000.
